1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Line break setting for mix text.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Text.LineBreak
6  ( -- * Line break
7    LineBreak (..),
8    lfString, crlfString,
9
10    -- * Unlimited line width
11    noBreak, lfBreak, crlfBreak,
12
13    -- * Limited line width
14    lf2, lf4, lf8,
15    crlf2, crlf4, crlf8,
16  ) where
17
18import qualified Data.Default as Def
19
20-- | Line break setting.
21data LineBreak = LineBreak
22    { breakWidth     :: Maybe Int  -- ^ Max width of line.
23    , breakNewline   :: String     -- ^ Newline string.
24    , breakContinue  :: String     -- ^ Newline string for breaking long line.
25    , breakIndent    :: String     -- ^ Indent string for breaking long line.
26    } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
27
28-- | Same as 'crlfBreak'.
29instance Def.Default LineBreak where
30    def = crlfBreak
31
32-- | LF: @"\\n"@
33lfString :: String
34lfString = "\n"
35
36-- | CRLF: @"\\r\\n"@
37crlfString :: String
38crlfString = "\r\n"
39
40
41-- ----------------------  Unlimited line width
42
43unlimited :: String -> LineBreak
44unlimited nl =
45    LineBreak { breakWidth     = Nothing
46              , breakNewline   = nl
47              , breakContinue  = nl
48              , breakIndent    = "" }
49
50-- | Line break by single space.
51noBreak :: LineBreak
52noBreak = unlimited " "
53
54-- | Line break by LF.
55lfBreak :: LineBreak
56lfBreak = unlimited lfString
57
58-- | Line break by CRLF.
59crlfBreak :: LineBreak
60crlfBreak = unlimited crlfString
61
62
63-- ----------------------  Limited line width
64
65limited :: String -> Int -> Int -> LineBreak
66limited nl ind wd =
67    LineBreak { breakWidth     = Just wd
68              , breakNewline   = nl
69              , breakContinue  = nl
70              , breakIndent    = replicate ind ' ' }
71
72-- | Line break by LF with 2 spaces indent and given-length column.
73lf2 :: Int -> LineBreak
74-- | Line break by LF with 4 spaces indent and given-length column.
75lf4 :: Int -> LineBreak
76-- | Line break by LF with 8 spaces indent and given-length column.
77lf8 :: Int -> LineBreak
78
79-- | Line break by CRLF with 2 spaces indent and given-length column.
80crlf2 :: Int -> LineBreak
81-- | Line break by CRLF with 4 spaces indent and given-length column.
82crlf4 :: Int -> LineBreak
83-- | Line break by CRLF with 8 spaces indent and given-length column.
84crlf8 :: Int -> LineBreak
85
86lf2    = limited lfString 2
87lf4    = limited lfString 4
88lf8    = limited lfString 8
89crlf2  = limited crlfString 2
90crlf4  = limited crlfString 4
91crlf8  = limited crlfString 8
